Returns: true if the listener handles the event and wants to override the default behavior of possibly rewriting the query based on the selected item, false otherwise.
Parameters: int: the absolute position in the list of suggestions.
onSuggestionSelect(int).Description: Called when a suggestion was selected by navigating to it.

Returns: true if the listener handles the event and wants to override the default behavior of launching any intent or submitting a search query specified on that item. Return false otherwise.
Parameters: int: the absolute position of the clicked item in the list of suggestions.
onSuggestionClick(int).Description: Called when a suggestion was clicked.

ClassDesc: Callback interface for selection events on suggestions. These callbacks are only relevant when a SearchableInfo has been specified by @B_android#widget#SearchView#setSearchableInfo_E@.
